title: The Snake Princess
author: Tamara (tael_the_tomato)
synopsis: In a world where magic and curses intertwine, Kai, the reincarnation of the feared  serpent deity, Kai Kai, faces an imposed marriage and a destiny she didnâ€™t choose. Join her  captivating journey as she defies her predestined fate and embarks on an exciting world of secrets and powers, seeking to break free from the chains of the past and discover a future she never  imagined.
